abstract: Both Windows and Mac provide a handy place on the screen to store frequently used program icons, and its location can be changed.
snippet: Both Windows and Mac provide a handy place on the screen to store frequently used program icons, and its location can be changed.
lead_paragraph: Q. Is there a way to move the strip of icons at the bottom of the computer screen over to the side where it’s more convenient?

headline.main: Moving Your Desktop Taskbar or Dock
headline.print_headline: Get Your Icons in a Row
